Articles.Content: When I launch KSP I just get a black screen. NO music no nothing. If I click on it, "Not Responding" comes up. No other Fourms I have read help with it MY computer is compatible, and I have ran it before. Why is not working ?

Edited September 28, 2021 by the_electro_bros
personal info
Try uninstalling and reinstalling KSP, remember to back your saves up first (copy from KSP/saves and paste on desktop, then do the reverse once reinstalled).
I reinstalled it and it worked. Thanks!
